channel.title: Games on xhocquet.info
channel.description: Recent content in Games on xhocquet.info

item.title: Civilization 6
item.description: xhocquet@::1 ~ $ / games / civilization 6 My Thoughts Good Mods Yet (not) Another Maps Pack Known as YnAMP. Detailed new map additions. Terra Mirabilis Large rework of natural wonders. Detailed Worlds Adds a bit more flavor to continents instead of blobs. Production Queue Really solid quality-of-life enhancement. If you have a set production order for new cities, this saves you some time.
